name: Traptris
description:
Traptris

Tetris game with some questionable Power-Ups.

Not all Power-Ups are good.

Will you try to gather power ups or avoid them ?

Game submited to GameDevTV Game Jam 2021

The theme is "All that glistens is not gold."

Credits

SFX from freesound.org users errysn, notchfilter and Raclure.

Music from opengameart.org/users/poinl

Art from opengameart.org/users/darkagent
